name: GMail Light Style
additional_info:
# INDEX BOX:
* hide top ads
* hide chat & invite
* hide  More
* hide foote
* hide stars in mail list
* hide trash icon in line mail
* hide arrow with type mailbox
* hide option selected or not by stars
* hide more option mark by star

# VIEW, WRITE MAIL BOX:
* hide right ads
* hide bottom ads
* hide popup ads
* hide bottom information about mail
* hide information on mouse over mail address
* hide star in view mail
* hide value mark / unmark by star
* hide translator bar

# OTHER:
* mails list hove
* dark loading page
* color for hyperlinks
